title: Please ID this typeface from Harvard GSD posters
content:
Hello,

If someone would be so kind to ID this typeface (often used in Harvard Graduate School of Design lecture posters), that would be very helpful.

Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [harvardgsd.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080219154746/http:/typophile.com/files/harvardgsd.jpg) | 78.65 KB |

 [‹ Astro Boy circa 1980](http://web.archive.org/web/20080219154746/http:/typophile.com/node/42067 "Go to previous forum topic") [Carole King's "Tapestry" album typeface ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080219154746/http:/typophile.com/node/42059 "Go to next forum topic")
author: de Graaf

comments.content:
Thank you for the prompt response, Stephen.

-Dan
